The changes made to User.non_updateable_params in 06c22b8 were alright. I don't think it works without the class method returning an Array and Hash#except being called with the splat'ed list of immutable attributes.

I think the reason why the tests failed is because spec/controllers/users_controller_spec.rb:6 incorrectly removes github_id where it should be github_handle. You apply the changes in 06c22b8 again (only without delete_keys_for_update since it is not needed) and modify the spec as stated above? Do the tests still break?

body:
The changes made to `User.non_updateable_params` in 06c22b8 were alright. I don't think it works without the class method returning an `Array` and `Hash#except` being called with the splat'ed list of immutable attributes.

I think the reason why the tests failed is because `spec/controllers/users_controller_spec.rb:6` incorrectly removes github_**id** where it should be github_**handle**. You apply the changes in 06c22b8 again (only without `delete_keys_for_update` since it is not needed) and modify the spec as stated above? Do the tests still break?
